member.name: M:System.IObservable`1.Subscribe(System.IObserver{`0})
member.summary: Subscribes an observer to the observable sequence.

member.name: T:System.IObserver`1
member.summary: Supports push-style iteration over an observable sequence.

member.name: M:System.IObserver`1.OnNext(`0)
member.summary: Notifies the observer of a new value in the sequence.

member.name: M:System.IObserver`1.OnError(System.Exception)
member.summary: Notifies the observer that an exception has occurred.

member.name: M:System.IObserver`1.OnCompleted
